marker.ph: /// Attempt to log the user in ...
/// Set color of indicator for TCP Server connection ...
/// Is the client connected to the TCP Server ...
/// Set color of indicator for TCP Server connection ...
/// Get direction of the received data. ...
/// The base page for all pages to gain base functionality ...
/// The animation that is played on page first load ...
/// The animation that is played of page unload ...
/// A flag to indicate if this page should animate out on load. ...
/// Once the page is loaded, perform any required animation ...
/// A base page with added ViewModel support ...
/// A base class to run any animation method when a boolean is set to true ...
/// A flag indicating if this is the first time this property has been loaded ...
/// The animation method that is fired when the value changes ...
/// Animates a framework element sliding it in from the right on show ...
/// Get the needed data from server. ...

<<Grid VerticalAlignment="Top" HorizontalAlignment="Left"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="auto"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<TextBox x:Name="LoginText" Style="{StaticResource EmailTextBox}" Grid.Row="0" Width="500" Tag="Your login here..." Margin="0,0,0,35"/>
<PasswordBox x:Name="PasswordText" Grid.Row="1" Width="500" Tag="Your password here..." Margin="0,0,0,35"/>
<Label Grid.Row="3" Style="{StaticResource SmallLabel}" Content="*incorrect login or password, try again" Foreground="{StaticResource MainColorBrush}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top"/>
<Button x:Name="LoginBtn" Grid.Row="3" Width="125" Height="35" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Content="Log in " Command="{Binding LoginCommand}" CommandParameter="{Binding SecurePassword, ElementName=PasswordText}" Style="{StaticResource ArrowButton}" /> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="auto"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <TextBox x:Name="LoginText" Style="{StaticResource EmailTextBox}" Grid.Row="0" Width="500" Tag="Your login here..." Margin="0,0,0,35"/> <PasswordBox x:Name="PasswordText" Grid.Row="1" Width="500" Tag="Your password here..." Margin="0,0,0,35"/> <Label Grid.Row="3" Style="{StaticResource SmallLabel}" Content="*incorrect login or password, try again" Foreground="{StaticResource MainColorBrush}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top"/> <Button x:Name="LoginBtn" Grid.Row="3" Width="125" Height="35" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Content="Log in " Command="{Binding LoginCommand}" CommandParameter="{Binding SecurePassword, ElementName=PasswordText}" Style="{StaticResource ArrowButton}" />.../>

<<Grid> <TextBlock Style="{StaticResource TitleCornerTextBlock}" Margin="45,40,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" HorizontalAlignment="Left"> <Run Text="RACING" Foreground="{StaticResource FirstLogoColorBrush}"/><Run Text="MONITOR" Foreground="{StaticResource SecondLogoColorBrush}"/> </TextBlock> <Grid Width="auto" Height="160" Margin="{Binding MainGridMargin}" VerticalAlignment="Center" HorizontalAlignment="Center"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBox Name="CourseNameBox" Text="{Binding CourseName, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" Tag="Course name..." VerticalAlignment="Top" Margin="0,0,30,0"/> <Button Content="GO! " Command="{Binding StartCommand}" Style="{StaticResource ArrowButton}" IsEnabled="{Binding IsCourseNameWritten}" VerticalAlignment="Top" HorizontalAlignment="left"/> </StackPanel> <Slider x:Name="ParticipantsSlider" Value="{Binding Participants}" Maximum="{Binding MaximumParticipants}" Minimum="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Bottom" Width="475"/> </Grid>
</Grid>.../>

<<TextBlock Style="{StaticResource TitleCornerTextBlock}" Margin="45,40,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" HorizontalAlignment="Left"> <Run Text="RACING" Foreground="{StaticResource FirstLogoColorBrush}"/><Run Text="MONITOR" Foreground="{StaticResource SecondLogoColorBrush}"/> </TextBlock> <Grid Width="auto" Height="160" Margin="{Binding MainGridMargin}" VerticalAlignment="Center" HorizontalAlignment="Center"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBox Name="CourseNameBox" Text="{Binding CourseName, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" Tag="Course name..." VerticalAlignment="Top" Margin="0,0,30,0"/> <Button Content="GO! " Command="{Binding StartCommand}" Style="{StaticResource ArrowButton}" IsEnabled="{Binding IsCourseNameWritten}" VerticalAlignment="Top" HorizontalAlignment="left"/> </StackPanel> <Slider x:Name="ParticipantsSlider" Value="{Binding Participants}" Maximum="{Binding MaximumParticipants}" Minimum="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Bottom" Width="475"/> </Grid>.../>
<<Run Text="RACING" Foreground="{StaticResource FirstLogoColorBrush}"/><Run Text="MONITOR" Foreground="{StaticResource SecondLogoColorBrush}"/>.../>

<<StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBox Name="CourseNameBox" Text="{Binding CourseName, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" Tag="Course name..." VerticalAlignment="Top" Margin="0,0,30,0"/> <Button Content="GO! " Command="{Binding StartCommand}" Style="{StaticResource ArrowButton}" IsEnabled="{Binding IsCourseNameWritten}" VerticalAlignment="Top" HorizontalAlignment="left"/> </StackPanel> <Slider x:Name="ParticipantsSlider" Value="{Binding Participants}" Maximum="{Binding MaximumParticipants}" Minimum="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Bottom" Width="475"/>.../>

<<TextBox Name="CourseNameBox" Text="{Binding CourseName, Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged}" Tag="Course name..." VerticalAlignment="Top" Margin="0,0,30,0"/> <Button Content="GO! " Command="{Binding StartCommand}" Style="{StaticResource ArrowButton}" IsEnabled="{Binding IsCourseNameWritten}" VerticalAlignment="Top" HorizontalAlignment="left"/>.../>

/// Get the needed data from server. ...

<<Grid VerticalAlignment="Top" HorizontalAlignment="Left"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="auto"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<TextBox x:Name="LoginText" Style="{StaticResource EmailTextBox}" Grid.Row="0" Width="500" Tag="Your login here..." Margin="0,0,0,35"/>
<PasswordBox x:Name="PasswordText" Grid.Row="1" Width="500" Tag="Your password here..." Margin="0,0,0,35"/>
<Label Grid.Row="3" Style="{StaticResource SmallLabel}" Content="*incorrect login or password, try again" Foreground="{StaticResource MainColorBrush}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top"/>
<Button x:Name="LoginBtn" Grid.Row="3" Width="125" Height="35" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Content="Log in " Command="{Binding LoginCommand}" CommandParameter="{Binding SecurePassword, ElementName=PasswordText}" Style="{StaticResource ArrowButton}" /> </Grid>.../>

Margin="0,0,0,35"/> <PasswordBox x:Name="PasswordText" Grid.Row="1" Width="500" Tag="Your password here..." Margin="0,0,0,35"/> <Label Grid.Row="3" Style="{StaticResource SmallLabel}" Content="*incorrect login or password, try again" Foreground="{StaticResource MainColorBrush}" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top"/> <Button x:Name="LoginBtn" Grid.Row="3" Width="125" Height="35" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Content="Log in " Command="{Binding LoginCommand}" CommandParameter="{Binding SecurePassword, ElementName=PasswordText}" Style="{StaticResource ArrowButton}" />.../>
/// Locates view models from the IoC for use in binding in XAML files ...
/// Attempt to log the user in ...
/// Set color of indicator for TCP Server connection ...
/// Is the client connected to the TCP Server ...
/// Set color of indicator for TCP Server connection ...
<<Style TargetType="{x:Type ComboBox}" BasedOn="{StaticResource MetroComboBox}"> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,0,5,5"/> <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="13"/> </Style>.../>
/// Get direction of the received data. ...
/// The base page for all pages to gain base functionality ...
/// The animation that is played on page first load ...
/// The animation that is played of page unload ...
/// A flag to indicate if this page should animate out on load. ...
/// Once the page is loaded, perform any required animation ...
/// A base page with added ViewModel support ...

<<Style x:Key="NoBorderWindow" TargetType="{x:Type Window}"> <Setter Property="ResizeMode" Value="NoResize"/> <Setter Property="WindowState" Value="Maximized"/> <Setter Property="WindowStyle" Value="None"/> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0"/> </Style>.../>
<<Setter Property="ResizeMode" Value="NoResize"/> <Setter Property="WindowState" Value="Maximized"/> <Setter Property="WindowStyle" Value="None"/> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0"/>.../>
/// A base class to run any animation method when a boolean is set to true ...
/// A flag indicating if this is the first time this property has been loaded ...
/// The animation method that is fired when the value changes ...
/// Animates a framework element sliding it in from the right on show ...
